ReferenceDocuments.name: What is the category of the d
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the category of the death detail assessment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the death detail category, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DDCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be either a heading, or a pre-printed category value on the CRF and not a question to which the site would provide an answer. If a question is asked, the response would typically be a sponsor-defined codelist. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as "Category" can be included as the column header.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be pre-printed on the CRF or screen and pre-populated in the data management system. This is not typically a question to which the site would provide an answer.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-9 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.24.18
